name: Asteroid Belt (Nrin)
description:
You find yourself in an enormous asteroid belt while mining for element zero. Your weapon systems have been damaged so all you can hope to do is avoid the asteroids and make your way home.

As you dodge asteroids you will see some of the precious element zero. Pick it up to charge your time dilation drive which will make all the future asteroids slower.

You will die... But try and dodge as many asteroids as you can!

Controls: Arrow keys to move

That's it, have fun!
